trans-unit.source: If omitted, notifications will not be delivered to a SNS topic.

trans-unit.source: If openshift >= 0.6.2, this defaults to ['strategic-merge', 'merge'], which is ideal for using the same parameters on resource kinds that combine Custom Resources and built-in resources. For openshift < 0.6.2, the default is simply strategic-merge.

trans-unit.target: 如果将参数enable_share设置为True,且未指定该参数,则会创建共享SCSI磁盘。SCSI EVS 磁盘不能从备份中创建,这意味着如果已指定 backup_id,则此参数不能为 True。

trans-unit.source: If passed a dictionary values which might be parsed as numbers, booleans or other types by the YAML parser must be quoted (e.g. "true") in order to avoid data loss.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递了字典值，则可能会使用YAML解析器将其解析为数字，布尔值或其他类型（例如 "true" ），以避免数据丢失。

trans-unit.source: If passed a list each items need to be in the format of KEY=VALUE.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过列表，则每个项目都必须采用 KEY=VALUE 的格式。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory and ends with "/", only the inside contents of that directory are copied to the destination. Otherwise, if it does not end with "/", the directory itself with all contents is copied.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是一个目录,并且以"/"结尾,则只将该目录内部的内容复制到目的地。否则,如果它不以"/"结尾,则复制目录本身和所有内容。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory, it is copied (including the source folder name) recursively to dest.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是目录，则将其（包括源文件夹名称）递归复制到 dest 。

trans-unit.source: If path is a directory, it is copied recursively. In this case, if path ends with "/", only inside contents of that directory are copied to destination. Otherwise, if it does not end with "/", the directory itself with all contents is copied. This behavior is similar to the rsync command line tool.
trans-unit.target: 如果path是目录，则以递归方式复制它。在这种情况下，如果路径以“ /”结尾，则仅将该目录的内部内容复制到目标。否则，如果它不以“ /”结尾，则将复制具有所有内容的目录本身。此行为类似于 rsync 命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: If path is a file and dest ends with "\", the file is copied to the folder with the same filename.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径是一个文件,并且dest以"\"结尾,则该文件将被复制到具有相同文件名的文件夹中。

trans-unit.source: If path is not specified default system temporary directory (%TEMP%) will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定路径,将使用默认的系统临时目录(%TEMP%)。

trans-unit.source: If path is not specified, the default system temporary directory will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定路径,将使用默认的系统临时目录。

trans-unit.source: If path is specified and the policy which the task is adding to, does not exist, it will create the policy first then add the task to it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了路径,且任务要添加的策略不存在,则会先创建策略,然后再将任务添加到其中。

trans-unit.source: If path is specified, delete operation only removes task from policy.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了路径,则删除操作仅从策略中删除任务。

trans-unit.source: If peer-accept is set to one, select the name of one peer to add to this authentication group. The peer must have added with the wanopt peer command. Source wanopt.peer.peer-host-id.
trans-unit.target: 如果peer-accept设置为1,选择一个对等体的名称添加到这个认证组。该对等体必须是用wanopt peer命令添加的。来源 wanopt.peer.peer-host-id。

trans-unit.source: If per user proxy settings are desired, use become to become any local user on the host. No password is needed to be set for this to work.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要每个用户的代理设置，请使用变得成为主机上的任何本地用户。无需设置密码即可运行。

trans-unit.source: If percent of CPU usage goes above the limit, the system marks the server as unavailable.
trans-unit.target: 如果CPU使用率的百分比超过限制,系统会将服务器标记为不可用。

trans-unit.source: If placement mode is 'auto', virtual services are automatically placed on service engines.
trans-unit.target: 如果放置模式为 "自动",虚拟服务会自动放置在服务引擎上。

trans-unit.source: If plugin exists with previous version, plugin will NOT be updated unless force is set to yes.
trans-unit.target: 如果插件具有以前的版本，则除非 force 设置为yes，否则插件将不会更新。

trans-unit.source: If plugin path from file system is provided, make sure that tar is present on remote machine and not on Ansible controller.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了来自文件系统的插件路径,请确保远程机器上存在tar,而不是Ansible控制器上。

trans-unit.source: If policy does not exist this setting is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果策略不存在,则忽略此设置。

trans-unit.source: If positive, maxRetryDuration specifies the time limit for retrying a failed task, measured from when the task was first attempted. Once maxRetryDuration time has passed and the task has been attempted maxAttempts times, no further attempts will be made and the task will be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果为正值,maxRetryDuration指定了重试失败任务的时间限制,从任务首次尝试开始计算。一旦过了maxRetryDuration时间,并且任务已经被尝试了maxAttempts次,就不会再进行尝试,任务将被删除。

A common cause of this issue is that the PSModulePath environment variable contains a UNC path to a file share and because of the double hop/credential delegation issue the Ansible process cannot access these folders. The way around this problems is to either:
trans-unit.target: 如果powershell失败，并显示类似于 The 'Out-String' command was found in the module 'Microsoft.PowerShell.Utility', but the module could not be loaded. 的错误消息，但无法加载该模块。那么尝试访问 PSModulePath 环境变量指定的所有路径可能会出现问题。此问题的常见原因是 PSModulePath 环境变量包含文件共享的UNC路径，并且由于双跳/凭据委派问题，Ansible进程无法访问这些文件夹。解决此问题的方法是：

trans-unit.target: 如果前面有^字符,序列将是一个控制字符。如果seq设置为0或1,则使用。

trans-unit.source: If present and device is specified, the EIP is associated with the device.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在且指定了设备,则EIP与设备相关联。

trans-unit.target: 如果存在,则分配一个EIP或将现有EIP与设备关联。

trans-unit.source: If present, it was observed that 'Cluster' interfaces were deleted, whatever the value.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在,则观察到'Cluster'接口被删除,不管是什么值。

trans-unit.target: 如果存在,则用名称和svm标识的证书来签署请求。

If present, will verify VLAN is present on template.

trans-unit.target: 如果提供了一个角色ARN,Ansible将尝试使用提供的凭证来承担这个角色。

trans-unit.source: If provided, id is used as key.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则将id用作密钥。

trans-unit.source: If provided, uuid is used as key.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则将uuid用作键。

trans-unit.source: If provided, it must be a different zone from the one provided in [locationId].
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,它必须与[locationId]中提供的区域不同。

trans-unit.source: If provided, the other locations for config files will not be considered.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,配置文件的其他位置将不被考虑。

trans-unit.source: If provided, the results will be filtered to show only the certificate with this ARN.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供,结果将被过滤,只显示带有该ARN的证书。

trans-unit.source: If proxy support is not needed, but the system may have it configured nevertheless, use the parameter use_proxy: no to avoid accidental system proxy usage.
trans-unit.target: 如果不需要代理支持，但是系统仍然可以对其进行配置，请使用参数 use_proxy: no 以避免意外使用系统代理。

trans-unit.source: If push delivery is used with this subscription, this field is used to configure it. An empty pushConfig signifies that the subscriber will pull and ack messages using API methods.
trans-unit.target: 如果此订阅使用推送,则此字段用于配置它。空的pushConfig表示订阅者将使用API方法拉取和回避消息。

trans-unit.source: If reading configurations from environment variables, the path in the command must be @tower_inventory.
trans-unit.target: 如果从环境变量读取配置,命令中的路径必须是@tower_inventory。

trans-unit.source: If reading from the YAML file, the file name must end with tower.(yml|yaml) or tower_inventory.(yml|yaml), the path in the command would be /path/to/tower_inventory.(yml|yaml). If some arguments in the config file are missing, this plugin will try to fill in missing arguments by reading from environment variables.
trans-unit.target: 如果从YAML文件中读取,文件名必须以tower.(yml|yaml)或tower_inventory.(yml|yaml)结尾,命令中的路径为/path/to/tower_inventory.(yml|yaml)。如果配置文件中的某些参数缺失,这个插件会尝试通过读取环境变量来填补缺失的参数。

trans-unit.source: If rule_index is not provided, client_match is used as a key to fetch current rule to determine create,delete,modify actions. If a rule with provided client_match exists, a new rule will not be created, but the existing rule will be modified or deleted. If a rule with provided client_match doesn't exist, a new rule will be created if state is present.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有提供rule_index,则使用client_match作为键来获取当前规则,以决定创建、删除、修改动作。如果提供了client_match的规则存在,则不会创建新的规则,但会修改或删除现有的规则。如果一个提供client_match的规则不存在,如果状态存在,则会创建一个新的规则。

trans-unit.source: If set to true, the URL scheme in the redirected request is set to https. If set to false, the URL scheme of the redirected request will remain the same as that of the request. trans-unit.source: If set, any hosts and groups that were previously present on the external source but are now removed will be removed from the Tower inventory. Hosts and groups that were not managed by the inventory source will be promoted to the next manually created group or if there is no manually created group to promote them into, they will be left in the "all" default group for the inventory. When not checked, local child hosts and groups not found on the external source will remain untouched by the inventory update process.
trans-unit.target: 如果进行了设置,以前存在于外部源上但现在已被删除的任何主机和组都将从塔楼清单中删除。未被清单源管理的主机和组将被提升到下一个手动创建的组,如果没有手动创建的组可将其提升到,则将其留在清单的 "所有 "默认组中。不勾选时,在外部源上找不到的本地子主机和组将保持不受清单更新过程的影响。

trans-unit.source: If source ranges are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic that has source IP address in these ranges. These ranges must be expressed in CIDR format. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. Only IPv4 is supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源范围,防火墙将只适用于源 IP 地址在这些范围内的流量。这些范围必须以 CIDR 格式表示。可以设置 sourceRanges 和 sourceTags 中的一个或两个。如果同时设置了这两个属性,防火墙将应用于源 IP 地址在 sourceRanges 内或源 IP 属于 sourceTags 属性中列出的标记的流量。连接不需要同时匹配这两个属性,防火墙就可以应用。仅支持 IPv4。

trans-unit.source: If source service accounts are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic originating from an instance with a service account in this list. Source service accounts cannot be used to control traffic to an instance's external IP address because service accounts are associated with an instance, not an IP address. sourceRanges can be set at the same time as sourceServiceAccounts. If both are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP belongs to an instance with service account listed in sourceServiceAccount. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply. sourceServiceAccounts cannot be used at the same time as sourceTags or targetTags.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源服务账户,防火墙将只适用于来自具有该列表中服务账户的实例的流量。源服务帐户不能用于控制指向实例外部 IP 地址的流量,因为服务帐户与实例相关联,而不是与 IP 地址相关联。sourceRanges 可以与 sourceServiceAccounts 同时设置。如果两者都设置了,防火墙将适用于源IP地址在sourceRanges内的流量,或者源IP属于sourceServiceAccount中列出的服务账户的实例。连接不需要同时符合这两个属性,防火墙就能应用。sourceServiceAccounts不能与sourceTags或targetTags同时使用。

trans-unit.source: If source tags are specified, the firewall will apply only to traffic with source IP that belongs to a tag listed in source tags. Source tags cannot be used to control traffic to an instance's external IP address. Because tags are associated with an instance, not an IP address. One or both of sourceRanges and sourceTags may be set. If both properties are set, the firewall will apply to traffic that has source IP address within sourceRanges OR the source IP that belongs to a tag listed in the sourceTags property. The connection does not need to match both properties for the firewall to apply.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了源标签,防火墙将仅适用于源 IP 属于源标签中所列标签的流量。源标签不能用于控制指向实例外部 IP 地址的流量。因为标签与实例相关联,而不是与 IP 地址相关联。可以设置sourceRanges和sourceTags中的一个或两个。如果设置了这两个属性,防火墙将适用于源 IP 地址在 sourceRanges 内或源 IP 属于 sourceTags 属性中列出的标记的流量。连接不需要同时符合这两个属性,防火墙就可以应用。

trans-unit.source: If supplied, restrict the additional facts collected to the given subset. Possible values: all, min, hardware, network, virtual, ohai, and facter. Can specify a list of values to specify a larger subset. Values can also be used with an initial ! to specify that that specific subset should not be collected. For instance: !hardware,!network,!virtual,!ohai,!facter. If !all is specified then only the min subset is collected. To avoid collecting even the min subset, specify !all,!min. To collect only specific facts, use !all,!min, and specify the particular fact subsets. Use the filter parameter if you do not want to display some collected facts.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供，则将收集的其他事实限制为给定的子集。可能的值： all ， min ， hardware ， network ， virtual ， ohai 和 facter 。可以指定值列表以指定更大的子集。值也可以与首字母 ! 指定不应收集该特定子集。例如： !hardware,!network,!virtual,!ohai,!facter 。如果指定 !all ，则仅收集最小子集。为了避免甚至收集min子集，请指定 !all,!min 。要仅收集特定事实，请使用 !all,!min ，并指定特定的事实子集。如果您不想显示一些收集的事实，请使用filter参数。

trans-unit.source: If the replace argument is set to yes, it will replace the entire running-config of the device with the config argument value. For devices that support replacing running configuration from file on device like NXOS/JUNOS, the replace argument takes path to the file on the device that will be used for replacing the entire running-config. The value of config option should be None for such devices. Nexus 9K devices only support replace. Use net_put or nxos_file_copy in case of NXOS module to copy the flat file to remote device and then use set the fullpath to this argument.
trans-unit.target: 如果 replace 参数设置为 yes ，它将使用 config 参数值替换设备的整个running-config 。对于支持从NXOS / JUNOS之类的设备上的文件替换运行配置的设备， replace 参数采用设备上用于替换整个running-config的文件的路径。对于此类设备， config 选项的值应为None。 Nexus 9K设备仅支持替换。如果是NXOS模块，请使用net_put或nxos_file_copy将平面文件复制到远程设备，然后将全路径设置为此参数。

trans-unit.source: If the affinity requirements specified by this field are not met at scheduling time, the vm will not be scheduled onto the node. If the affinity requirements specified by this field cease to be met at some point during vm execution (e.g. due to a vm label update), the system may or may not try to eventually evict the vm from its node. When there are multiple elements, the lists of nodes corresponding to each term are intersected, i.e. all terms must be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: 如果在调度时未满足此字段指定的亲和性要求，则不会将虚拟机调度到该节点上。如果在虚拟机执行过程中某个时候不再满足此字段指定的相似性要求（例如，由于vm标签更新），则系统可能会或可能不会尝试最终从其节点中退出vm。当有多个元素时，与每个 term 相对应的节点列表将相交，即必须满足所有术语。

trans-unit.source: If the affinity requirements specified by this field are not met at scheduling time, the vm will not be scheduled onto the node. trans-unit.source: If the lookup fails due to lack of permissions or due to an AWS client error then the aws_ssm will generate an error, normally crashing the current ansible task. This is normally the right thing since ignoring a value that IAM isn’t giving access to could cause bigger problems and wrong behaviour or loss of data. If you want to continue in this case then you will have to set up two ansible tasks, one which sets a variable and ignores failures one which uses the value of that variable with a default. See the examples below.
trans-unit.target: 如果由于权限不足或AWS客户端错误而导致查找失败，则aws_ssm将生成一个错误，通常会使当前的ansible任务崩溃。这通常是正确的做法，因为忽略IAM不提供访问权限的值可能导致更大的问题，错误的行为或数据丢失。如果要在这种情况下继续操作，则必须设置两个忙碌的任务，一个任务设置一个变量，而忽略失败，另一个任务使用该变量的值作为默认值。请参阅下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: If the requested object path is missing, and any mainPageSuffix object is missing, if applicable, the service will return the named object from this bucket as the content for a 404 Not Found result.

trans-unit.source: If the requested object path is missing, the service will ensure the path has a trailing '/', append this suffix, and attempt to retrieve the resulting object. This allows the creation of index.html objects to represent directory pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果请求的对象路径缺失,服务将确保该路径有一个尾部的'/',附加这个后缀,并尝试检索结果的对象。这允许创建index.html对象来表示目录页。

trans-unit.source: If the response is paginated, return all pages.
trans-unit.target: 如果响应是分页的,则返回所有页面。

trans-unit.source: If the script contains several queries, they must be semicolon-separated.
If the script prompts for data (for example, a database password), send the prompts to standard error

trans-unit.target: 如果无法检索到密码并将其设置为 always ，则模块将始终进行更改。

trans-unit.source: If the section does not exist then the module will return an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果该部分不存在,那么模块将返回一个错误。

trans-unit.source: If the service does not respond to the 'running' command, name a substring to look for as would be found in the output of the ps command as a stand-in for a 'running' result. If the string is found, the service will be assumed to be running.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务不响应“运行”命令，请在ps命令的输出中找到要查找的子字符串，作为“运行”结果的替代。如果找到该字符串，则将假定该服务正在运行。

trans-unit.source: If the service has different generations of hardware, for the same SKU, then that can be used here
If the service is being restarted or reloaded then sleep this many seconds between the stop and start command. This helps to workaround badly behaving services.

trans-unit.source: If the session will run as a group managed service account (gMSA) then this is the name.

trans-unit.target: 如果角色的来源是Galaxy，则以namespace.role_name格式指定角色：

trans-unit.source: If the specified absolute path (file or directory) already exists, this step will not be run.

trans-unit.target: 如果指定的磁盘类型在AZ中不可用,磁盘将创建失败。如果EVS磁盘是从快照创建的,volume_type字段必须与快照的源磁盘相同。

trans-unit.source: If the specified service group should exists.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的服务组应该存在。

trans-unit.source: If the specified virtual server should exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的虚拟服务器应该存在。

trans-unit.source: If the state is ENABLED, then the compute environment accepts jobs from a queue and can scale out automatically based on queues.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态为 ENABLED ，则计算环境将接受队列中的作业，并可以基于队列自动进行扩展。

trans-unit.source: If the state is absent, the account will either not exist or be deactivated.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态 absent ，则该帐户将不存在或被停用。

trans-unit.source: If the state is changed_key, the account must exist. The account key will be changed; no other information will be touched.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态为 changed_key ，则该帐户必须存在。帐户密钥将被更改；没有其他信息将被触及。

trans-unit.source: If the state is present, the rpm will be installed, If the state is absent, it will be removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果状态存在,则会安装转速,如果状态不存在,则会被删除。

trans-unit.source: If the string is found, the service will be assumed to be running.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到该字符串,将假定该服务正在运行。

trans-unit.target: 如果找到该字符串,将假定服务已经启动。

trans-unit.source: If the subscriber never acknowledges the message, the Pub/Sub system will eventually redeliver the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户从不确认消息,Pub/Sub系统最终会重新发送消息。

trans-unit.target: 如果提供的volume_name与其他目标关联，它将被更新为此处提供的内容。

trans-unit.source: If the system finds no topology record that matches both the server object and the local DNS, then the system assigns that server object a zero score.
trans-unit.target: 如果系统没有发现同时匹配服务器对象和本地DNS的拓扑记录,那么系统会给该服务器对象一个零分。

trans-unit.source: If the system you are configuring is the IPsec initiator, and you select both versions, the system tries using IKEv2 for negotiation. If the remote peer does not support IKEv2, the IPsec tunnel fails. To use IKEv1 in this case, you must deselect Version 2 and try again.
trans-unit.target: 如果你配置的系统是IPsec发起者,并且你选择了这两个版本,系统会尝试使用IKEv2进行协商。如果远程对等体不支持IKEv2,IPsec隧道就会失败。在这种情况下,要使用IKEv1,必须取消选择版本2并重新尝试。

trans-unit.source: If the system you are configuring is the IPsec responder, and you select both versions, the IPsec initiator system determines which IKE version to use.
trans-unit.target: 如果你配置的系统是IPsec响应者,并且你同时选择了这两个版本,那么IPsec发起者系统会决定使用哪个IKE版本。

trans-unit.source: If the target does not respond within the set time period, it is considered down.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在规定的时间内没有反应,则认为是停机。

trans-unit.source: If the target host is Windows you can now use fact_path. Make sure that this path exists on the target host. Files in this path MUST be PowerShell scripts (*.ps1) and their output must be formattable in JSON (Ansible will take care of this). Test the output of your scripts. This option was added in Ansible 2.1.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标主机是Windows，则现在可以使用 fact_path 。确保此路径在目标主机上存在。此路径中的文件必须是PowerShell脚本（ *.ps1 ），并且它们的输出必须是JSON格式的表（Ansible将负责此操作）。测试脚本的输出。此选项是在Ansible 2.1中添加的。

trans-unit.source: If the target host is Windows, you will not currently have the ability to use filter as this is provided by a simpler implementation of the module.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标主机是Windows，则当前将无法使用 filter 因为该过滤器是由模块的更简单实现提供的。

trans-unit.source: If the target is a directory, setting this to yes will make it the default ACL for entities created inside the directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标是目录，则将其设置为 yes 将使其成为在目录内创建的实体的默认ACL。

trans-unit.source: If the target responds within the set time period, it is considered 'up'. If the target does not respond within the set time period, it is considered 'down'. When this value is set to 0 (zero), the system uses the interval from the parent monitor.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在设定的时间段内作出响应,则认为是 "向上"。如果目标在设定的时间段内没有响应,则认为是 "向下"。当该值设置为0(零)时,系统使用父显示器的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: If the target responds within the set time period, it is considered up.
trans-unit.target: 如果目标在设定的时间段内有反应,则认为是向上。

trans-unit.source: If the task is failing at the time on connection initialization itself it is recommended to enable this option globally else if an individual task is failing intermittently this option can be enabled for that task itself to find the root cause.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务本身在连接初始化时出现故障,建议在全局范围内启用这个选项,否则如果单个任务间歇性地出现故障,可以为该任务本身启用这个选项,以找出根本原因。

trans-unit.source: If the task is failing on connection initialization itself, you should enable this option globally. If an individual task is failing intermittently this option can be enabled for that task itself to find the root cause.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务本身在连接初始化时出现故障,则应全局启用此选项。如果单个任务间歇性失败,可以为该任务本身启用该选项,以查找根本原因。

trans-unit.source: If the task seems to be hanging, first verify remote host is in known_hosts. SSH will prompt user to authorize the first contact with a remote host. To avoid this prompt, one solution is to add the remote host public key in /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts before calling the hg module, with the following command: ssh-keyscan remote_host.com >> /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务似乎挂起，请首先确认远程主机在 known_hosts 中。SSH将提示用户授权与远程主机的首次联系。为了避免出现此提示，一种解决方案是在调用hg模块之前，使用以下命令在 /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts 中添加远程主机公钥：ssh-keyscan remote_host.com >> / etc / ssh / ssh_known_hosts。

trans-unit.source: If the task seems to be hanging, first verify remote host is in known_hosts. SSH will prompt user to authorize the first contact with a remote host. To avoid this prompt, one solution is to use the option accept_hostkey. Another solution is to add the remote host public key in /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts before calling the git module, with the following command: ssh-keyscan -H remote_host.com >> /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务似乎挂起，请首先确认远程主机在 known_hosts 中。SSH将提示用户授权与远程主机的首次联系。为避免出现此提示，一种解决方案是使用选项accept_hostkey。另一个解决方案是在调用git模块之前，使用以下命令在 /etc/ssh/ssh_known_hosts 中添加远程主机公钥：ssh-keyscan -H remote_host.com >> / etc / ssh / ssh_known_hosts。

trans-unit.source: If the template results in an empty string or None value it is ignored.
If the throughput_mode is provisioned, select the amount of throughput to provisioned in Mibps.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供了 throughput_mode,请选择要提供的吞吐量,单位为 Mibps。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout is exceeded before the operation is completed, the module will error.
trans-unit.target: 如果在操作完成前超过超时,模块会出错。

trans-unit.source: If the timeout is reached and the Foreman action did not complete, the ansible task fails. However the foreman action does not get canceled.
trans-unit.target: 如果达到超时,而领班操作没有完成,则ansible任务失败。然而领班的操作不会被取消。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the DSC resource option is a CimInstance or CimInstance[], this means the value should be a dictionary or list of dictionaries based on the values required by that option.
trans-unit.target: 如果DSC资源选项的类型为 CimInstance 或 CimInstance[] ，则意味着该值应为基于该选项所需值的字典或词典列表。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the DSC resource option is a DateTime, you should use a string in the form of an ISO 8901 string to ensure the exact date is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果DSC资源选项的类型为 DateTime ，则应使用ISO 8901字符串形式的字符串以确保使用了确切的日期。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the DSC resource option is a PSCredential then there needs to be 2 options set in the Ansible task definition suffixed with _username and _password.
trans-unit.target: 如果DSC资源选项的类型是 PSCredential ,则在Ansible任务定义中需要设置2个选项，后缀 _username 和 _password 。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the DSC resource option is an array, then a list should be provided but a comma separated string also work. Use a list where possible as no escaping is required and it works with more complex types list CimInstance[].
trans-unit.target: 如果DSC资源选项的类型是数组，则应提供一个列表，但逗号分隔的字符串也可以使用。尽可能使用列表，因为不需要转义，它可以与更复杂的类型list CimInstance[] 。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户有能力发起出站连接。

trans-unit.target: 如果用户提供了一个值,将使用用户提供的前缀(相当于在UI中选择 "其他 "选项)。

trans-unit.source: If the user will need to have the same privileges as the admin account, set it to true.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户需要拥有与管理员账户相同的权限,请将其设置为 "true"。

trans-unit.source: If the utilization is less than the reservation, the extra bandwidth is used for other host infrastructure traffic class types.
trans-unit.target: 如果利用率低于预留值,则多余的带宽将用于其他主机基础设施流量类别类型。

trans-unit.target: 如果vNIC模板有关联的QoS策略,这里指定的MTU必须等于或小于QoS系统类中指定的MTU。

trans-unit.target: 如果值可以是NetBIOS名称，DNS服务器名称，带通配符（ * ）的DNS主机名后缀，包含通配符序列的DNS域名的NetBIOS或星号。

trans-unit.source: If the value ends with the `%` sign, then the new weight will be relative to the initially configured weight.
trans-unit.target: 如果数值以`%`号结尾,那么新的权重将相对于最初配置的权重。

trans-unit.source: If the value is not specified in the task and the environment variable DOCKER_CERT_PATH is set, the file ca.pem from the directory specified in the environment variable DOCKER_CERT_PATH will be used.
trans-unit.target: 如果任务没有指定值和环境变量 DOCKER_CERT_PATH 设置，文件 ca.pem 从环境变量指定的目录 DOCKER_CERT_PATH 将被使用。

trans-unit.target: 如果任务没有指定值和环境变量 DOCKER_CERT_PATH 设置，文件 cert.pem 从环境变量指定的目录 DOCKER_CERT_PATH 将被使用。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, After the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are deleted immediately when the interface goes Down. If the value is false, After the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are not deleted immediately when the interface goes Down.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口Down时,接口上的EBGP会话会被立即删除。如果值为false,启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口Down时,不会立即删除接口上的EBGP会话。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, Application results of route announcement. If the value is false, Routing application results are not notified.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则公布路由的申请结果。如果值为假,则不通知路由申请结果。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BFD is enabled. If the value is false, BFD is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用BFD。如果该值为false,则禁用BFD。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP auto FRR is enabled. If the value is false, BGP auto FRR is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用BGP自动FRR。如果该值为假,则禁用BGP自动FRR。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP deterministic-MED is enabled. If the value is false, BGP deterministic-MED is disabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用BGP确定性-MED。如果值为false,则禁用BGP deterministic-MED。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP is enabled to advertise REFRESH packets. If the value is false, the route refresh function is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用BGP广告REFRESH数据包。如果该值为假,则启用路由刷新功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP is enabled to advertise only optimal routes in the RM to peers. If the value is false, BGP is not enabled to advertise only optimal routes in the RM to peers.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则表示BGP只向对等体宣传RM中的最优路由。如果该值为false,则不启用BGP只向对等体宣传RM中的最优路由。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP is enabled to record peer session status and event information. If the value is false, BGP is disabled from recording peer session status and event information.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用BGP记录对等体会话状态和事件信息。如果该值为假,则禁止BGP记录对等体会话状态和事件信息。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, BGP routes cannot be advertised to the IP routing table. If the value is false, Routes preferred by BGP are advertised to the IP routing table.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则BGP路由不能向IP路由表发布广告。如果该值为假,则BGP首选的路由会被广告到IP路由表中。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, Non-standard capability codes are used during capability negotiation. If the value is false, RFC-defined standard ORF capability codes are used during capability negotiation.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则在能力协商期间使用非标准能力代码。如果值为false,则在能力协商期间使用RFC定义的标准ORF能力代码。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, VPN BGP instances are enabled to automatically select router IDs. If the value is false, VPN BGP instances are disabled from automatically selecting router IDs.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用VPN BGP实例自动选择路由器ID。如果该值为假,则禁止VPN BGP实例自动选择路由器ID。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, VPN-Target filtering function is performed for received VPN routes. If the value is false, VPN-Target filtering function is not performed for received VPN routes.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则对接收到的VPN路由执行VPN-目标过滤功能,如果值为假,则对接收到的VPN路由不执行VPN-目标过滤功能。如果值为false,则对收到的VPN路由不执行VPN-目标过滤功能。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, When the vpnv4 multicast neighbor receives and updates the message, the message has no label. If the value is false, When the vpnv4 multicast neighbor receives and updates the message, the message has label.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息没有标签,如果值为假,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息有标签。如果为假,当vpnv4组播邻居收到并更新消息时,消息有标签。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, advertised ARP routes are distinguished. If the value is false, advertised ARP routes are not distinguished.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则公告的ARP路由被区分。如果值为false,则不区分宣传的ARP路由。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, advertised IRB routes are distinguished. If the value is false, advertised IRB routes are not distinguished.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则公告的IRB路由被区分。如果值为false,则不区分宣传的IRB路由。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, after the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are deleted immediately when the interface goes Down. If the value is false, after the fast EBGP interface awareness function is enabled, EBGP sessions on an interface are not deleted immediately when the interface goes Down.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口宕机时,接口上的EBGP会话立即被删除。如果该值为假,在启用快速EBGP接口感知功能后,当接口Down时,接口上的EBGP会话不会被立即删除。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, automatic aggregation is enabled for locally imported routes. If the value is false, automatic aggregation is disabled for locally imported routes.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用本地导入路由的自动聚合功能,如果值为假,则禁用本地导入路由的自动聚合功能。如果值为false,则禁用本地导入的路由的自动聚合。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, enable reduce priority to advertise route. If the value is false, disable reduce priority to advertise route.
trans-unit.target: 如果该值为真,则启用降低优先级来发布路由广告。如果为假,则禁用降低优先级来发布路由广告。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, enable vpls-ad. If the value is false, disable vpls-ad.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为真,则启用vpls-ad。如果值为假,则禁用vpls-ad。
